    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AntiAliasing
    Provides anti-aliased rendering routines for Mandelbrot set visualization.
    ColorUtils
    Utility class for working with ARGB and RGB color values.
    ConvertCoordinate<T,U>
    Defines a bidirectional mapping between two coordinate systems.
    Gradient
    Abstract base class representing a sparse definition of a color gradient.
    GradientEntry
    Represents a single, immutable color node within a continuous color gradient.
    GradientException
    Custom exception type thrown when an error occurs while processing a color gradient.
    LayoutElement
    Represents a square region in a 2D pixel layout grid.
    Main
    Entry point for generating a Mandelbrot zoom video.
    MandelbrotColoring
    Converts the results of Mandelbrot set evaluations into RGB color values.
    MandelbrotInput<T>
    Container for all input parameters required to evaluate a point in the Mandelbrot set.
    MandelbrotOutput<T>
    Encapsulates the result of evaluating a point for membership in the Mandelbrot set.
    MandelbrotOutput.HowFound
    How the point was determine to be in the Mandelbrot set.
    MandelbrotProcessor<T>
    Defines the interface for Mandelbrot set evaluation algorithms.
    MandelbrotProcessorDouble
    High-performance implementation of the Mandelbrot set evaluator using double precision.
    PixelToDoubleCartesian
    Converts image-space coordinates to their equivalent positions in the Cartesian plane using double-precision arithmetic.
    RenderUtils
    Utility methods for rendering and layout generation in Mandelbrot visualizations.
    SaveToFolder
    Generates and saves a sequence of Mandelbrot zoom images to a specified folder.
    SmoothGradient
    Converts discrete color nodes into a continuous gradient using Catmull-Rom cubic interpolation.
    VideoCreator
    Utility for converting a sequence of image frames into an MP4 video using FFmpeg.
